footer.No 1 Dai Co Viet, Hai Ba Trung District,: No. 1 Dai Co Viet, Hai Ba Trung District, Hanoi, Vietnam

heroSection.text1: Do you have a passion for baseball?
heroSection.text2: Are you looking for a place to showcase your passion?
heroSection.text3: Do you want to boost your health, sharpen your skills, and make lasting memories on the field?
heroSection.text4: Are you curious about what it's like to compete alongside your teammates?
heroSection.text5: If so, HRO is the perfect place for you!

aboutUs.text1: From the days when they were members of the Hanoi Amsterdam Phoenix (HAP) club,
aboutUs.text2: Minh Ha and Minh Chau dreamed of bringing baseball closer to everyone.
aboutUs.text3: After years of dedicated training and learning,
aboutUs.text4: the two decided to turn their dream into reality by founding HRO on October 21, 2020.
aboutUs.text5: Recognizing the untapped potential in the fertile ground of HUST, filled with young sports enthusiasts,
aboutUs.text6: they began to explore and plant the seeds of baseball here.
aboutUs.text7: The flame of baseball passion was ignited in the early days of HRO's establishment,
aboutUs.text8: becoming a gathering place for baseball lovers, especially students of HUST.

timeline.Early stage description: In the early days, HRO faced countless difficulties. The lack of facilities and training equipment was unavoidable. In the beginning, our training ground was just an empty field with a few old gloves. Each member had to bring their own gear and share it with others. However, these challenges forged our willpower and brought everyone closer together. Although we started with nothing, HRO has proven that with a burning passion for baseball, belief, and unity, any obstacle can be overcome.
timeline.Official description: In March 2021, a new chapter was opened in HRO's history when we officially became a club under the Hanoi University of Science and Technology's Youth Union, affiliated with the Sports and Cultural Committee. This was a significant milestone marking the club's growth.
timeline.Cup2023: NATIONAL BASEBALL CLUB CUP 2023 - VIN CAFÉ CUP
timeline.Cup2023 description: HRO concluded its journey in the “2023 National Baseball Club Cup” with a third-place finish, earning a bronze medal. Despite being a team with little experience, our relentless training under Hanoi's scorching sun during weekdays paid off, leading to a successful tournament.
timeline.HBMS2023 description: Building on the momentum from the national tournament in July, HRO continued to participate in the “2023 Hanoi Baseball Championship.”
timeline.Cup2024: NATIONAL BASEBALL CLUB CUP 2024 - KOREAN AMBASSADOR'S CUP
timeline.Cup2024 description: Although the results were not as expected, HRO delivered thrilling and captivating matches at the 2024 National Baseball Tournament.

activity.Weekly Practice des: Practice skills, tactics, and enjoy baseball together
activity.Internal Matches des: Test practical abilities, assess performance through exciting internal matches
activity.Participate in Tournaments des: Join baseball tournaments organized in Hanoi and nationwide
activity.Friendly Matches des: Engage in interesting matches and exchange experiences with other clubs in Hanoi
activity.Recruitment des: Search for new teammates for the next generation annually
activity.Baseball Experience des: Interact with HRO at events held at the Hanoi University of Science and Technology

faq.description: Browse through these FAQs to find answers to commonly asked questions
faq.panel1-a: Absolutely! HRO does not discriminate based on age, gender, profession, school, or prior baseball experience. However, being a student at Hanoi University of Science and Technology (HUST) is a common connection.
faq.panel2-a: We typically recruit new members around October. The process involves three rounds: initial selection, interviews, and tryouts for three positions: Manager, Media, and Player. If you have a passion for baseball, feel free to join HRO!
faq.panel3-q: Do I need to prepare equipment like gloves and bats when joining HRO?
faq.panel3-a: HRO provides shared equipment like gloves, bats, and balls. If you already have your own gear, that’s convenient. Remember to bring it if you participate in tryouts!
faq.panel4-q: Can I join HRO's practice sessions?
faq.panel4-a: Certainly! If you’d like to join our practice sessions, reach out to us via our Facebook fan page or directly contact our club leaders.

contact.description: Any question or remark? just write us a message
contact.Please share your ideas or requests with: Please share your ideas or requests with us.
contact.description2: Want to find a place to enjoy baseball? Curious about baseball rules or HRO? We're here to answer all your questions!
